name: Solarpunk Taskforce Dev
updateContentCommand: set -e; npm i -g pnpm && pnpm --version && pnpm install
postCreateCommand: set -e; npm i -g supabase vercel; supabase --version; git lfs install --system || true; mkdir -p src/lib; if [ -n "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" ]; then supabase login --token "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" || true; else echo 'WARN: SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN not set'; fi; if [ -n "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" ]; then supabase gen types typescript --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" > src/lib/database.types.ts || echo 'WARN: types gen failed'; else echo 'WARN: SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF not set'; fi
postStartCommand: if [ -n "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" ]; then supabase link --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi
